schema.description: 保证请求幂等性。从您的客户端生成一个参数值，确保不同请求间该参数值唯一。`ClientToken`只支持ASCII字符，且不能超过64个字符。更多详情，请参见[如何保证幂等性](~~25693~~)。
报备实例所属的地域ID。您可以调用[DescribeRegions](~~25609~~)查看最新的阿里云地域列表。
删除报备单原因，请详细填写。

400.errorMessage: The regionId should not be null.
The RegionId provided does not exist in our records.
The InstanceType of the specified instance does not support demand.

403.errorMessage: The status of the specified demand is not support modify.
User not authorized to operate on the specified resource, or this API doesn't support RAM.

404.errorMessage: The InstanceChargeType does not exist in our records
The DemandStatus does not exist in our records
The ZoneId provided does not exist in our records.
The InstanceType provided does not exist in our records.
The InstanceType provided does match the InstanceTypeFamily in our records.
The specified DemandId is not found

title: 删除ECS资源需求报备信息
summary: 调用DeleteDemand删除ECS资源需求报备信息。您可通过该接口自助删除提交的资源需求信息。
description: > 该接口正在内测中，尚未正式上线，暂时不建议使用，请您耐心等待。
